label: HelpActivity
text: To add a joke to favourites list just press bright yellow 'Star' icon next to the joke. Press it again to remove it from favorties. How to add jokes to favourites? In Jokes app you can share your favourite jokes in Facebook SMS and more. From Joke page press the share button on top and select Facebook. You will see a login window where you can enter your login credentionals and share the joke. How can I share jokes? Please make sure that the app is installed on your device's internal memory. If it is on the external storage you need to move it to phone's Settings/Applications/Manage Applications/... and click on 'Move to phone'. I cannot find the jokes widget
